sentences.sContent: Bad management will land the company in debt.
sentences.sCn: 经营不善会使公司负债。

sentences.sContent: Stop spending so fast,or you'll fetch us up in debt.
sentences.sCn: 停止这样挥霍浪费，不然你要使我们负债的。

sentences.sContent: His gambling losses put him deeply [heavily] in debt.
sentences.sCn: 他因赌博输钱而负债累累。
